alert.note: Alert for Central Somerset; Northern Franklin; Northern Oxford (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 10 at 4:54AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...Elevated Fire Weather Danger Today... Very dry air and gusty winds will move into the mountains today and combine with dead and dry fuels such as grass, leaves, and twigs to create the potential for uncontrolled fire spread. Relative humidity will fall to 25 to 35% in some areas, and 15 to 25% above 2500 feet. Winds diminish late this afternoon with increasing relative humidity values tonight. Extra caution should be taken to prevent wildfires. Always consult with fire officials before engaging in any open burning activities and comply with all applicable laws and regulations. Never leave an open fire unattended and always extinguish campfires completely before leaving.

area.areaDesc: Central Somerset; Northern Franklin; Northern Oxford
